title: Baby Carrier
description: larger bottom section fully embroidered in diagonal squares in reds, purple, green; side borders embroidered in vertical pattern on beige with five snaps on each side; small rectangle patch at top repeated in smaller section which is beige; binding on all edges except snap edges
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
